sentence: There was repair work being done on the executive beach which was disrupting the tranquil atmosphere
The rooms were shabby and faded and sadly needed updating
The rooms are of a high standard though the showers need some maintenance to stop the bathroom floor from flooding
They were also renovating the outside play area directly under our room with pneumatic tools being used until the early hours of the morning making it impossible to get away from the noise
I was in a refurbished room but during the day there was constant noise and it was loud obviously renovations above so it was difficult to concentrate on work
Although told differently about outside refurbishment hours we were only awoken a couple of times during our 10 night stay and soon got used to the noises during the day time
Such a great place for kids although they are carrying out refurbishment of some of the childrens play areas
It is next to Wadi park but at the moment it ’s closed for the maintenance
Bathrooms need a good clean or even better refurbishment
Stayed in a 2BDR suite which was n’t newly renovated
I hope with the refit there is a rethink because this hotel is left years behind
I believe the rooms have been revamped and decorated since my visit but even then the rooms were amazing all smart technology yet still felt homely
Been a view times in Jumeirah beach hotel and before the renovation it was top

I have been staying here since August 200 and seen this great hotel transform across 18 years I visited in May before they closed for the refurbishment and I could not wait to go back in October to see all of the changes but mainly did the hotel retain the splendour and magic we have experienced on all previous visits
After our last trip in April we were really looking forward to trying the newly refurbished Jumeira Beach hotel
Currently staying there and the refurb is nice
We have been coming for years and came this year to see what its refurb looks like
Having heard about the hotel refurbishment that ended in October 2018 our family of 4 decided to book a one bedroom ocean suite for the February 2019 UK half term holiday
I was there for the first time in 206 and decided after staying at 7 other hotels in the last 10 years to go there again after the renovation
Still a fantsatic hotel after a great refurb
The rooms were nicely renovated with a nice modern touch and very clean
The place in itself is of majestic design ravishing lobby since it has been refurbished
This was my first time at JBH and found out that they had recently undergone a refurbishment
Refurbished JBH is amazing
The hotel is newly renovated and the finishing is quite good
The new renovation is awesome and the hospitality is top notch
The refurbishment completed is outstanding
The room was super clean and updated it makes you wish it was your home
the puldown beds are a huge plus and the only plus of the whole refurbishment in my opinionJBH Please bring back your great in house restaurants
Refurbished and looking very smart
